mapper.select: select idx, title, content, writer, date(indate) as indate, date(updateDate) as updateDate, count from myboard
select idx, title, content, writer, date(indate) as indate, count from myboard m where idx = #{idx}
select f.filename, f.savefilename, f.filepath, f.board_id from myboard m inner join file f on m.idx = f.board_id where idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into myboard ( memId, title, content, writer ) values ( #{memId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.update: update myboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updateDate = now() where idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into file ( filename, savefilename, filepath, board_id ) values ( #{filename}, #{savefilename}, #{filepath}, #{board_id} )
